hymn.title: We are for the great migration

lyrics.stanza: We are for the great migration, And, O Lord, we seek Thy face. Who? and when? and where? Lord Jesus, Grant us now Thy blessed grace.
This is for Thy house and city, This is for Thy kingdom, Lord; To subdue the earth before us We are all in one accord.
Burden us with Thy great plan, Lord; Consecrated we would be. To fulfill Thy holy purpose Saturate us thoroughly.
Build, O build us all together, Let us here our lessons learn, Send us forth to many cities For the church-life there to burn.
Many places need a beachhead To bring in Thy reign and rule. Lord, build up the local churches That Thy kingdom come in full!
Then the earth will give Thee glory And the devil get the shame. For Thy kingdom's rule and reigning All will praise Thy glorious name.
Blessed days are quickly coming; We rejoice and give Thee praise For the glorious consummation And Thy royal ruling days.
Hallelujah to the Father, Hallelujah to the Son, Hallelujah to the Spirit— Hallelujah, it is done!
Hallelujah for the churches, Hallelujah for the saints, Hallelujah for the meetings And their holy, sweet constraints!
Hallelujah, hallelujah, Hallelujah we will sing; Hallelujah, hallelujah, Hallelujah to our King!
